    Generation - Class in modelisation
    Static registry of Ennemies, Weapons, Items, Floors and Dungeons

    genererArticles() - Static method in class modelisation.Generation
    Generates a random list of weapons (for example, merchant inventory).
    genererDonjon() - Static method in class modelisation.Generation
    Generates a complete dungeon with several floors.
    genererEnnemis() - Static method in class modelisation.Generation
    Generates a random list of enemies for a combat.
    genererEtape() - Static method in class modelisation.Generation
    Generates a random map of rooms for an Etape (one floor).
    genererItems() - Static method in class modelisation.Generation
    Generates a random list of items (usually used for treasure rewards).
